hero.title: Frontend Engineer
hero.description: Building applications that enhance user experience with modern web technologies.

about.title: About
about.description: About telosh - Systems Engineer at a Tokyo-based SIer
about.bio: A systems engineer working at a Tokyo-based SIer. I hold multiple Google Cloud certifications and focus on designing and developing cloud-native systems. In my free time, I enjoy playing PC games.
about.gamingDescription: Mainly playing action and FPS games

timeline.title: Timeline
timeline.subtitle: My journey from student days to now
timeline.studentLife: Attended a boarding school with no smartphones or internet
timeline.tennisMid: Member of the tennis club in junior high
timeline.soccerHigh: Member of the soccer club in high school
timeline.halEnroll: Enrolled in the 4-year IT program at HAL Tokyo
timeline.hormonJob: Started part-time job at a Yakiniku restaurant because "the food you serve looks delicious"
timeline.feStudy: Dedicated time to studying for the Fundamental IT Engineer Examination
timeline.quitHormon: Quit the restaurant job before summer
timeline.selfStudy: Searched for IT-related part-time work while self-studying
timeline.fePass: Passed the Fundamental IT Engineer Examination
timeline.dataJob: Started a part-time job focusing on data entry automation using GAS and Python
timeline.shibuyaCrowds: The Shibuya crowds during commute solidified my desire for fully remote work
timeline.eccube: Started part-time at an EC-CUBE company but left due to health issues
timeline.freelanceStart: Started working as a freelancer in both frontend and backend development
timeline.slackBot: Built a simple attendance management system with Slack Bot + Next.js (never released)
timeline.gcpStudy: Started studying for various Google Cloud certifications
timeline.aiDev: Worked on chat app development using Vercel AI SDK and internal RAG chat systems
timeline.securityCert: Obtained Professional Cloud Security Engineer certification
